title: Drum Set
summaries: The Drum Set is a novelty furniture item used in conjunction with the Drumstick to produce drum sounds. The Drum Set and Drumstick can be purchased from the Merchant after one of the following bosses is defeated: Eater of Worlds, Brain of Cthulhu, Skeletron, or Wall of Flesh.
To play drum sounds, a player holding a Drumstick must be standing directly over the Drum Set and press âš’ Use / Attack.
The particular drum sound played is determined by the distance from the character to the cursor.
From closest to farthest, by distance from the player (approximate percentage of the screen away from the character):

• 0-2.5%: Kick Drum
  • 2.5-5%: Low Tom
  • 5-7.5%: Mid Tom
  • 7.5-11%: Hi Tom
  • 11-13.3%: Snare Drum
  • 13.3-16.6%: Floor Tom
  • 16.6-19%: Hi-Hat (closed)
  • 19-22.5%: Hi-Hat (open)
  • 22.5-25%: Cymbal 1
  • 25%+: Cymbal 2

statistics.Tooltip:
Playable next to Drum Set
'The coffee is strong...and vulgar'
statistics.Buy: 50 SC
statistics.Sell: 10 SC
